item.title: Grilled salmon,red lentil pasta with rosso pesto & a sprinkle of parmesan served with classic caesar salad
item.description: Grilled salmon,red lentil pasta with rosso pesto & a sprinkle of parmesan served with classic caesar salad So since I have all the time on my hands I decided to start making new dishes and decide how complementary flavors can get on my own (although I am sure there are books out there!
